articles.title: Scientists Develop 'Heat-Resistant' Coral To Reduce The Effect Of Bleaching - Mashable India
articles.description: Scientists have now developed coral that is ‘heat resistant’ so it is impervious to the rising temperatures of the ocean. The research was targetted at reducing the impact of coral bleaching that has become more frequent because of climate change.

articles.title: ICESat-2 Measures Arctic Ocean's Sea Ice Thickness, Snow Cover - NASA
articles.description: Initial results from NASA’s ICESat-2 satellite suggest that Arctic sea ice has thinned by as much as 20 % since the end of the first ICESat mission (2003-2009).
